content.text: Tailors, Curtains &Bedsheet

Need alterations, custom clothing, or home furnishings in Abu Dhabi? This guide lists trusted tailors, fabric shops, and curtain specialists offering quality work at fair prices. From quick fixes and school uniform alterations to custom abayas and made-to-measure curtains—discover where locals go for reliable stitching, honest pricing, and same-day service.
Quick Guide: Finding the Right Service
For Quick Fixes & Alterations
Hemming pants: AED 15-25
Taking in/letting out: AED 20-35
School uniform adjustments: AED 10-20 per item
Turnaround: Same day to 2 days
For Custom Clothing
Men’s kandura: AED 80-150
Women’s abaya: AED 120-300
Formal suit tailoring: AED 300-800
Turnaround: 3-7 days
For Home Furnishings
Curtains (per window): AED 150-400
Bedsheet sets: AED 80-200
Cushion covers: AED 25-60 each
Turnaround: 2-5 days
Top Tailor Areas & Clusters
Zayed the First Street Tailor Souq (Madinat Zayed)
Best for: Traditional clothing, abayas, kanduras, school uniforms
The go-to destination with dozens of tailors working side by side. Most offer same-day service for simple alterations and have experience with traditional Gulf clothing.
Abu Saeed Tailoring – Main Souq Entrance
Speciality: Men’s kanduras, formal thobes, traditional embroidery
Pricing: Kandura AED 90-140, alterations from AED 15
Rating: 4.3★ (Local community feedback)
Languages: Arabic, Urdu, Hindi, basic English
“Best kandura fit in the souq. My husband goes here for all his formal wear.”
Ladies Fashion Tailoring – Inside Souq
Speciality: Abayas, jalabiya, women’s formal wear
Services: Custom embroidery, beadwork, size adjustments
Pricing: Simple abaya AED 120, embroidered AED 200-350
Rating: 4.2★ (Women’s groups recommendations)
“Beautiful handwork on abayas. The aunty knows exactly how to fit properly.”
Universal Tailors – Corner Shop
Speciality: School uniforms, children’s clothing, quick alterations
Services: Same-day hemming, logo embroidery, name tags
Pricing: School uniform AED 15-30, logo embroidery AED 10
Rating: 4.4★ (Parent recommendations)
“Saved me during back-to-school rush. Fixed 5 uniforms in 2 hours.”
Getting There: Behind KM Trading Center, Madinat Zayed  View on Google Maps
Electra Street Tailor Row
Best for: Men’s formal wear, business suits, professional alterations
Known for higher-end tailoring and formal menswear. Several established tailors compete on quality and service.
Elite Men’s Tailoring – Near Hamdan Centre
Speciality: Custom suits, formal shirts, professional alterations
Services: Suit fitting, shirt tailoring, tie adjustments
Pricing: Custom suit AED 400-800, shirt AED 80-120
Rating: 4.5★ (Business community reviews)
Turnaround: 5-7 days for suits, 2-3 days alterations
“Perfect fit for business suits. Worth the price for professional appearance.”
Express Alterations – Mid Electra Street
Speciality: Quick professional fixes, uniform alterations
Services: Same-day hemming, zipper repair, button replacement
Pricing: Basic alterations AED 20-40, express service +50%
Rating: 4.2★ (Working professionals)
“Lifesaver for last-minute alterations. Open late and works fast.”
Home Furnishing Specialists
Zayani Souq – Fabric & Curtain Hub
Best for: One-stop shopping for curtains, bedsheets, upholstery
Central marketplace with competitive prices on textiles and made-to-measure home furnishings.
Al Noor Curtains & Fabrics
Speciality: Custom curtains, blinds, fabric selection
Services: Home measurement, installation, fabric advice
Pricing: Curtains AED 180-450/window, installation AED 50-100
Rating: 4.3★ (Home decorating groups)
Fabric Range: 200+ options from budget to premium
“Measured and installed perfectly. Great fabric selection and honest pricing.”
Home Comfort Textiles
Speciality: Bedsheets, comforter sets, cushion covers
Services: Custom sizing, matching sets, bulk orders
Pricing: Bedsheet sets AED 90-220, cushions AED 30-70
Rating: 4.1★ (Residential community feedback)
“Quality cotton bedsheets at reasonable prices. They make odd sizes too.”
Royal Upholstery Workshop
Speciality: Sofa covers, chair reupholstery, furniture fabrics
Services: Foam replacement, custom covers, repair work
Pricing: Sofa reupholstery AED 800-1,500, covers AED 300-600
Rating: 4.4★ (Furniture restoration reviews)
“Brought my old sofa back to life. Professional work and fair pricing.”
View Zayani Souq on Google Maps
Mussafah Textile Market
Best for: Wholesale fabrics, bulk orders, budget-friendly options
Industrial area market with wholesale prices and extensive fabric variety.
Emirates Textile Trading
Type: Wholesale fabric supplier with retail section
Speciality: Curtain fabrics, upholstery materials, bulk textiles
Advantage: 30-50% cheaper than retail, minimum quantities apply
Best for: Multiple windows, commercial projects, renovation jobs
“Best prices for large orders. Need to buy minimum 10 meters but worth it.”
Fabric Plus Accessories
Type: Notions, threads, buttons, zippers, trim supplies
Services: Pattern consultation, sewing supplies, equipment
Community: Popular with home sewers and tailoring businesses
“One-stop shop for all sewing needs. Staff knows their products well.”
Getting There: Mussafah Industrial Area, near Muroor Road intersection
Money-Saving Tips
Best Value Areas
Madinat Zayed Souq: Competitive pricing, multiple options to compare
Mussafah Market: Wholesale prices for bulk orders
Electra Street: Good balance of quality and fair pricing
Smart Shopping Strategies
Compare 3 quotes before committing to expensive work
Buy fabric yourself from wholesale markets, pay only for tailoring
Group orders with neighbors for better rates on curtains
Off-season timing – better deals during non-wedding/non-school seasons
Timing Your Projects
Avoid rush periods: Back-to-school, Eid, wedding season
Same-day service: Expect 50-100% premium for urgent work
Bulk discounts: Many tailors offer 10-15% off for 5+ items
